entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MsBuildWorkspace throws exception when netcoreapp2.1 app is loaded #71919
  • "The server disconnected unexpectedly" when using package referencing Microsoft.CodeAnalysis #71914
  • Should speculative semantic models be able to disable nullable analysis? #71904

Closed

  • When automatically converting an "if" statement into a conditional expression using the C# editor, unintended conversion may occur. #70750
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce allocations during NamespaceSymbol.LookupNestedNamespace #71921
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix code that errantly assumed a paramarray parameter must be an array #71920
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Align `params` type validation with the the spec #71918
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Update to 8.0.0 in 17.10 branch #71916
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Helping runtime diagnose a CI bug #71913
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Fixed the Go To Definition for ValueTuple #71912
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Handle ref safety of user-defined conversions #71911
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Report better warnings and errors if build hosts exit abnormally #71909
    Area-IDE
  • Enable implicit primary constructor parameter capture analyzer #71905
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Cleanup SolutionCreator code. #71915
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Disallow UseConditionalExpression with unsafe or checked/unchecked blocks #71917
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Revert "Merge pull request #71412 from vibeeshan025/main #71853
    Area-IDE, untriaged, OnDeckForQB
  • Fix NewtonsoftJsonVersion problem #71876
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Write and read uniformly in objectwriter/objectreader #71877
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Allocate exactly the space needed when creating a sourcetext #71886
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Disable autoBraceSurround on 17.9 P2 tests #71897
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Provide overloads to avoid unnecessary boxing #71894
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #71910
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #71908
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to release/dev17.10 #71907
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move to Preview 4 image #71899
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to release/dev17.10 #71906
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update 'use collection expression' to support implicit reference conversions with arrays #71836
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Share common code in compilation tracker #71858
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Remove support for base extensions #71883
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use `/generatedfilesout` in generated SyntaxTree.FilePath #71879
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fail tests if errors are reported #71893
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve syncing of project cones. #71826
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve use of SyntaxContext in snippet and method/type import completion providers #71872
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement module cancellation and stack probing instrumentations #71896
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets: Work on `ctor` snippet after modifiers #71869
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Let the formatter format the whitespaces when converting an ArrowClauseExpression to a ReturnStatement when applicable #71757
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Prevent error propagations by misplaced semicolon in list parsing #71712
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Using Nullable Disabled semantic model to compute semantic classification #71036
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Switch the BuildHost to build with net6.0 again #71881
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Sit object reader/writer on top of pipes. #71880
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add `Lock` object feature #71716
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [PR VALIDATION] extend live table data source #71539
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Refactors LSP server extension assembly loading #71862
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Upgrade Language Server to run on .NET 8 #71903
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
